column4: And, when downloading an older release of ubuntu, can I have an up to dat kernel, i.e. one without the root exploit.
Now I have 7.1, and I would like to downgrade to 6.* or 7.4
I dunno kernel versions but are there restrictions on the ekrnel versions one uses depending on the release of ubuntu, i.e. can I completely update my kernel in a 6.* install?
